mapper.sql: id , code, status, reimid, reimno, reimname, feedeptid, feedeptname, yearid, yearperiod, monthid, feemonth, reimbursemonth, authorfeenum, contributionfee, externalauditfee, needtaxtotal, noneedtaxtotal, reimburseflag, deleteflag, times, createtime, creatorid, creatorname, updatetime, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT id, `code`,status, yearperiod yearPeriod, feemonth feeMonth, feedeptname feeDeptName, authorfeenum authorFeeNum, contributionfee contributionFee, externalauditfee externalauditFee, contributionfeenext contributionFeeNext, externalauditfeenext externalauditFeeNext, needtaxtotal needTaxTotal, noneedtaxtotal noneedTaxTotal, creatorname creatorName, DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTime, remark FROM budget_authorfeesum
1=1
and yearid = #{params.yearid}
and status = #{params.status}
and code like concat('%',#{params.code},'%')
and feedeptname like concat('%',#{params.feeDeptName},'%')
and feemonth like concat(#{params.feeMonth},'%')
order by createtime desc
select * from budget_agent_execute_view where yearid=#{yearid} and reimflag=1 and reuqeststatus>0

SELECT report.id, report.yearperiod, report.feemonth feeMonth, report.reportcode, report.copefeesum, report.taxsum, report.realfeesum, DATE_FORMAT( report.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS createtime FROM budget_authorfee_report AS report
1=1
and report.yearid = #{yearid}
ORDER BY report.feemonth desc

SELECT bam.id, bam.yearperiod, bam.feemonth, bam.reimbursesubject, bam.authorname, bam.authoridnumber, bam.taxpayeridnumber, details.tax as tax, details.copefee as copefee, (details.copefee - details.tax) as realfee, bam.gatherunit, bam.gatherbankaccount, bam.gatherbank, bam.payunit, wb.province gatherbankProvince, wb.city gatherbankCity, bam.salaryunit, CONCAT(bam.payunit,'-',bam.paybankaccount) 'payBankAccount', bam.paybank, bam.feebdgdept, DATE_FORMAT( bam.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS createtime FROM budget_authorfeedtl_merge bam inner join ( SELECT authormergeid, SUM(tax) as tax, SUM(copefee) as copefee FROM budget_authorfeedetail WHERE needzz = 1 AND authormergeid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY authormergeid ORDER BY authormergeid ) details on bam.id = details.authormergeid left join budget_author ba on bam.gatherbankaccount = ba.bankaccount left join wb_banks wb on wb.sub_branch_code = ba.branchcode left join budget_year_period byp on byp.period = bam.yearperiod
1=1
and bam.reportid = #{params.reportid}
and byp.id = #{params.yearid}
and bam.feemonth like concat('%',#{params.feemonth},'%')
and bam.authorname like concat('%',#{params.authorname},'%')
order by bam.feemonth desc
